topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 1.1: Viewing Compute Instance Details

body.p: Compute instances are virtual machines that run inside the cloud.
From the details screen, you can:

ul.li: View recent activity (same data as in nova console-log)

body.p: To view information on your instance:

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Project dashboard, then the System panel, then the Overview link.
Click the name of the instance to view. The following information is listed:

ul.li: Time the instance has been up

li.p: Click Log to view recent activity (same data as in nova console-log)
Click Action Log to view the Instance Action List (same output as nova instance-action-list)
Click Console to launch a Console Window
